recipesJson.name: Raspberry Filled Donuts
recipesJson.author: SteamOn
recipesJson.description: This turned out to be quite enjoyable. It was an earlier rendition of Blue Doh that got super steeped. After stumbling upon the steeped test mix I was amazed and immediately began to share online. Check it out if you have all the flavors. No notes for this one as they kind of got erased after developing Blue Doh, But I do certainly suggest you mix this up.

reviews.text: Lovely mix! Can't add anymore to what Schlayer notes. I have been searching for a decent adv donut & think I may well have found it! Cheers SteamOn
Nice, fairly dense but works well as an MTL vape - nice raspberry flavor!
This is a great mix! Great fried doughnut taste with a sweet raspberry filling.
